name: Test94IgnoreSourceWarning
publisher: Federal Office of Public Health FOPH

contact.name: Federal Office of Public Health FOPH

test.name: Test94
test.description: Test script to verify that warning Binding for path (.+) has no source, so can't be checked

assert.description: Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the returned resource is an OperationOutcome.
Confirm that we have no errors.

assert.expression: issue.where(severity='information' and diagnostics.matches('Binding for path (.+) has no source, so can\'t be checked')).count() = 0
